errors.error_description: The quickstart installation command attempts to install a non-existent package 'py-evm-core' alongside 'py-evm', which will cause pip to fail.
correction_candidates: Change the command to 'python -m pip install py_evm'.
Run 'python -m pip install py-evm' and then 'python -m pip install py-evm-core' in separate commands.
Change the command to 'python -m pip install "py-evm[core]"'.
Change the command to 'python -m pip install py-evm'.
errors.golden_answer: Change the command to 'python -m pip install py-evm'.
